Improvements.Improvement: Refactor the method to use a helper method for adding Tag values to the set
Improvements.Description: The method `getFuels` repeatedly calls `fuels.addAll(Tag.<tag>.getValues());` for different tags. This is repetitive and can be encapsulated in a helper method for better code readability and maintainability.

Improvements.Improvement: Refactor the method to use a helper method for adding individual Material values to the set
Improvements.Description: The method `getFuels` repeatedly calls `fuels.add(Material.<material>);` for different materials. This is repetitive and can be encapsulated in a helper method for better code readability and maintainability.
